```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(stringr)
library(forcats)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggridges)
```

```{r}
noaa = read_csv("./data/nynoaadat.zip")%>% 
  clean_names()
```

#Make the bar plot of the missing value of snow.
```{r}
noaa %>%
  group_by(id) %>%
  summarize(n_missing_tmax = sum(is.na(tmax)), n_missing_snow = sum(is.na(snow))) %>%
  gather(key = parameter, value = n_missing, n_missing_tmax:n_missing_snow) %>% 
   filter(parameter == "n_missing_snow") %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~parameter, y = ~n_missing, color = ~id, colors = "Set1",
       type = "bar" )

```

#maked
```{r}
noaa %>% 
   separate(date, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = "-") %>% 
   filter(snow < 200 & snow > 0) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~year, y = ~snow, color = ~year,
          colors = "Set1",                                       
          type = "box")                  
```
